name: Right Click Menu (Like hayatikodla.net)
author: Hasan Yüksektepe

sections.description:
DEMO : https://hayatikodla.net

When users coming to your website with this wordpress plugin right click, they will be greeted with a special menu for your website.

After installing the plugin, a menu location named “Right Click Menu” will appear on the “Apperance/Menus/Manage Locations” page.

Create a new menu, edit it as you wish, and choose “Right Click Menu” as the location for the menu you created.

It will be broadcast live on your website as soon as you register.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload right-click-menu-hayatikodla.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to “Appearence/Menus” Menu
  4. Theme Location Under “Right Click Menu” select your menu and save
sections.faq:
How to use?

After installing the plugin, a menu location named “Right Click Menu” will appear on the “Apperance/Menus/Manage Locations” page.

Create a new menu, edit it as you wish, and choose “Right Click Menu” as the location for the menu you created.

It will be broadcast live on your website as soon as you register.

Can I edit the design?

We will add this feature in future versions of the plugin.
